rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with traditional Kerala elements and minimalistic design.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Uses traditional stone finishes and wooden beams in line with Vastu principles for energy flow.
Traditional Kerala kitchen integrated with an outdoor terrace, featuring built-in storage units to optimize space on a tight budget.
Modular dining area that can be used as a combined kitchen-living space if needed. Emphasizes flexibility and local craftsmanship.
A dedicated library with shelves built into the wall, providing a quiet retreat. Adheres to Vastu principles by orienting it in the northeast direction for knowledge enhancement.

openings.description: A robust wooden door with traditional Kerala motifs. Provides privacy and security.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light, placed on the living room wall facing north as per Vastu guidelines.
